name: zip(_:_:_:)
desc: Combines elements from two other publishers and delivers a transformed output.
declaration: func zip<P, Q, T>(_ publisher1: P, _ publisher2: Q, _ transform: @escaping (Self.Output, P.Output, Q.Output) -> T) -> Publishers.Map<Publishers.Zip3<Self, P, Q>, T> where P : Publisher, Q : Publisher, Self.Failure == P.Failure, P.Failure == Q.Failure
